item.title: CometLabs Platform Summary
item.description: 1. Introduction Product Summary: CometLabs is a platform for developers to showcase their projectsâ€™ proof of work and build a more analytical resume. Recruiters can also leverage the platform to find pre-screened developers. It gives in-browser coding environments that fetch and deploy repositories to show previews and code and provide detailed insights into code quality and best practices. Target Audience 1: Software Developers, College Students to 4 YoE Employees, Freelancers

item.title: The Unique Features of CometLabs Playgrounds
item.description: CometLabs: Simplifying Developer Hiring CometLabs is not just an online editor but a comprehensive platform that simplifies the hiring process for developers and recruiters. The cloud-based development platform, CometLabs Playgrounds, offers unique features that set it apart from other online editors. Here are some of the innovative features: 1. In-Browser IDEs for 33+ Technologies CometLabs Playgrounds support over 33+ product-building languages and frameworks, providing a versatile and robust environment for developers to showcase their skills and proof of work through full-stack applications.

item.title: GSoC 2023: Final Report | PEcAn Project
item.description: Documenting my complete GSoC journey with PEcAn Project for Google Summer of Code 2023.
